name: Radagast
description:
Radagast puts you into the role of a wizard who's been thrown into an arena, and has to fight for his life... and freedom!

You fight 15 waves of enemies, each wave getting harder and harder! With awesome boss fights!

Controls:

- Z: Forward

- S: Backward

- Q: Left

- D: Right

- Mouse: Look around

- hold down Left click: Shoot fireball

- Right Click: Shoot Ice Barrage

- Shift + mouse location: Teleport

Music by Peter Crowley: https://petercrowleyfantasydream.jimdo.com
